thread.title: CBS’ Scott Pelley: ‘Today We Learned the Length of the President’s Fuse’
thread.title_full: CBS’ Scott Pelley: ‘Today We Learned the Length of the President’s Fuse’

author: Josh Feldman
title: CBS’ Scott Pelley: ‘Today We Learned the Length of the President’s Fuse’
text:
CBS’ Scott Pelley: ‘Today We Learned the Length of the President’s Fuse’ by Josh Feldman | 7:25   “Today we learned the length of the president’s fuse—28 days.” – @ScottPelley weighs in on @POTUS ’ press conference https://t.co/HOjG2HJ8AN pic.twitter.com/f1YzKmxhNW 
— CBS Evening News (@CBSEveningNews) February 16, 2017 
Scott Pelley opened tonight’s CBS Evening News by actually saying, “Today we learned the length of the president’s fuse––28 days.” 
That was how Pelley basically summed up today’s massive press conference in which President Trump , he said, “went on offense with the familiar tools that built his career––bluster, bravado, exaggeration, and a few loose facts.” 
Watch above, via CBS.
